property.caption: Default size
property.description: When no size attribute is set or the value is empty or zero, use this value for the size of the top or left pane

property.caption: Height
property.description: Height of the entire split pane. Must be a valid CSS height value. When placed in a scroll container, as with regular layouts, height in percentage will not work. Specify a height in pixels.

property.caption: Current size
property.description: Optional. When the attribute is set, the size of the top or left pane is set using this value. Also the attribute is updated after the divider is dragged.

property.caption: Min. size left/top
property.description: Minimum size for the left or top container. Leave at zero for no minimum. Note that some content will 'break out' from the pane when the width is too small.

property.caption: Min. size right/bottom
property.description: Minimum size for the right or bottom container. The minimum is 20 to prevent the divider from becoming unreachable

property.caption: On change action
property.description: Optional. Triggered when divider has been dropped at a new position, only when an attribute has been selected for the current size.
